unnormalised: Someone asked if Col. Sharma was actually good at his job, or if he just looked good in his uniform. I told them, "Well, they don't make you Gen. overnight for looking handsome, do they? Though, I heard rumour Maj. Khan's chai skills were legendary, almost got him promoted!" Seriously though, the man earned his stripes, or should I say, his star - 15 years in service is no joke, even if half that time was spent trying to figure out how to use the base's coffee machine. You can't become Brig. without knowing a thing or two!
